name: Nachos
description: A no-fail quick and easy crowd-pleaser.

ingredients.name: mixed diced bell peppers, tomatoes and onions
Fajita Seasoning
ingredients.quantity: 1 cup diced, cooked chicken, seasoned with

preparation: Arrange chips on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Sprinkle with vegetables and diced chicken. Top with cheese, and sprinkle with dip mix.
Sprinkle with green onions and serve with guacamole and salsa, if desired.
Arrange chips in a cast iron pan.
Sprinkle with vegetables and diced chicken. Top with cheese, and sprinkle with dip mix.
Grill, with lid closed, until cheese melts, 8-10 min.
Sprinkle with green onions and serve with guacamole and salsa, if desired.
tips: Swap meat for 1 cup cooked black beans or lentils.

products.name: Fajita Seasoning
summary: A lively, mild blend for seasoning beef, chicken, or fish fajitas & enchiladas.

products.name: Nacho Cheese Dip Mix
summary: A delicious blend of bold chili with real Parmesan makes for a creamy nacho cheese dip or seasoning.

products.name: Guacamole Dip Mix
summary: An all-natural blend of sweet peppers, garlic, and chilies comes together to create the perfect guacamole––minus the sodium and additives!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chillies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
